sentences.en: " Oh, " thought Drouet, " how delicious is my conquest. "
sentences.cn: “ 啊, ” 杜洛埃想, “ 我这次的胜利真是妙不可言埃. ”

sentences.en: After the Norman Conquest the forest became a royal hunting preserve.
sentences.cn: 诺曼征服之后，这片森林成为了皇家狩猎区。

sentences.en: He had led the conquest of southern Poland in 1939.
sentences.cn: 1939年，他指挥了攻占波兰南部的行动。

sentences.en: He was telling his tales of conquest in clubland.
sentences.cn: 当时他正在大讲特讲自己在夜总会的征服史。

sentences.en: Her latest conquest is an Italian who, interestingly enough, doesn't speak a word of his native language.
sentences.cn: 她新搭上了个意大利人。有意思的是，那个意大利人一句意大利语都不会说。

sentences.en: His family traces back to the Norman Conquest.
sentences.cn: 他的家世可追溯到诺曼人征服英国的时代.

sentences.en: Khan, Tamerlans in the fury of conquest exterminated all who resisted them.
sentences.cn: 成吉思汗, 塔马兰在狂热的开疆拓土中消灭了所有反抗他们的人.

sentences.en: Steve seems to have made a real conquest of Lily. They're always together.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫好像真的赢得了莉莉的芳心. 他们总是在一起.

sentences.en: The chase is always much more exciting than the conquest anyway.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，追求的过程总比得手更为刺激。

sentences.en: the Norman Conquest (= the conquest of England by the Normans )
The Normans ruled England by right of conquest.
sentences.cn: 诺曼人征服了英格兰成了统治者.

sentences.en: The play is being widely read as an allegory of imperialist conquest.
sentences.cn: 这部剧被广泛解读为对帝国主义征服的讽喻。

sentences.en: The rich and handsome young man made a conquest of Jeanne.
sentences.cn: 这位富裕而又英俊的年轻人赢得了琴的爱情.

sentences.en: The Spanish conquest then cut short any further independent development.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人的征服打断了他们的任何进一步的独立发展.

sentences.en: They succeeded in the conquest of that city.
You've made quite a conquest there, ie He or she likes you!

phrases.tran_cn: [史]诺曼底人对英格兰的军事征服

trans.tran_cn: 征服，占领（地），攻克，（爱情或性方面）被俘虏者
trans.tran_en: the act of getting control of a country by fighting
